name: Beauty Princess Royal Wedding
description:
Did you know about the Fairy Tale Land which is ruled by a beautiful princess? Well if you like this sort of stories with princesses, kings and queens and you also love dress up games for girls and kids free fun beauty salon with fashion than you're in luck cause here you have not only an awesome wedding preparation salon but a complete wedding center with all that a girl needs to become a gorgeous princess and a lovely bride for his prince!

As you start the game you will be welcomed in a fairytale sky land where any girl can become a princess, there you'll have all the beauty salons you can think of and which can help you look wonderful. Take your time to explore the fairytale view and after that you can start right from the bottom to the top, with the glamour spa salon, where you can spoil your princess with some of the most fantastic creams and facial treatments!

Getting ready for a royal wedding is not as simple as you think it could be and in this wedding preparation salon you'll find out just how many creams you'll have to use, how many beauty tools are there and just how you have to use them, you'll even have a check-list which you'll need to complete in order to get further in the game, here you're going to feel like in a real wedding design studio!

Next is the wedding makeup salon girl game or level if you like, where girls love to spend most of their time with all kinds of make-up tools like, lipstick, eye shadow and many more, which if used together can form one of the most fashionable makeover you can think of, even better than whatever you may have seen in the ever after high dress up games!

Do you like taking some time and taking care of your manicure, or maybe you love to play with colours, shapes, stickers and glitter, if this are the kind of things which you like, and you also feel like a fashion artist, than here at this ice princes fever salon, you'll get to decorate some of the most stylish nails you might ever seen!

If those three levels where quite of a challenge for you, than you could relax and enjoy playing with some accessories, bride dresses, tiara, luxurious shoes, and also some cool and sweet combination of tops and bottoms which could make the perfect wedding day surprise for your prince and for all the guests invited, this surely will be a fun level which you'll love to play every day with us!

So when you think you're done with design your own wedding dress level and all the other wedding mania super levels, than you can check out the final wedding dash, the ever after moment which you all been waiting for, but not before you take care of the prince, of course! Use all the beauty tricks you have learned from the levels before and give this prince a crown, a sword and an awesome cape to go with his awesome costume and only then you can pronounce them husband and wife! Don't forget to take a photo, so that you can have a beautiful memory image of this unique moment!

This surely will be one of the most unique and fun 5 year old games for girls free in which the little kids will learn all about how to dress a princess, and all about bride fashion!

We wish you beautiful holidays and have fun with our winter fairy!
